references.paper_title: Elements of causal inference: foundations and learning algorithms
references.reason: This book provides a comprehensive overview of causal inference, forming a foundational basis for the paper's theoretical framework.
This book is a seminal work on causality, providing essential concepts and background for the field of causal discovery.
This paper offers an introduction to causal inference, providing context and background information for the causal discovery methods discussed in the paper.

references.paper_title: Review of causal discovery methods based on graphical models
references.reason: This review paper provides a comprehensive overview of causal discovery methods based on graphical models, which are essential to the paper's approach.

references.paper_title: Optimal structure identification with greedy search
references.reason: This paper introduces a greedy search algorithm for causal structure learning, providing a benchmark algorithm for comparison and evaluating the performance of the proposed algorithm.
